name: Links Air Full Flight - Doncaster to Belfast City (Jetstream 31)
description:
Full flight onboard Links Air's Jetstream 31 G-GAVA, operating flight LNQ200 from Doncaster-Sheffield to Belfast City.

Departure is from runway 02 at Doncaster before we set course for Belfast, crossing the Isle of Man and arriving into Belfast City's runway 22.

Video taken from seat 3A.

GoPro Hero 3

✈ ✈
Equipment used:

Camera: GoPro Hero4 Silver http://goo.gl/Wz7Uxt
Mount: Generic suction mount http://goo.gl/E2vRBs
Swivel Mount: http://goo.gl/vWQVne
Boya Frame Case for GoPro: http://goo.gl/tqM3H1
Battery: Anker E7 25600mAh  http://goo.gl/ZXfxOy
MicroSD cards: Sandisk 128GB http://goo.gl/KDjm4Y
